definition: just as in the past (idiom); as before/continuing as always
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
as/as if/such as
already/since/both... (and...)
old variant of 往[wang3]
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: The Sri Lankan government will as always adhere to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 斯政府将一如既往地坚持一个中国政策。

sentences.english: While gaokao fever is as strong as ever this year, criticism is mounting.
sentences.chinese: 虽然今年的高考热一如既往，但批评声音也越来越多。

sentences.english: eBay has consistently had one of the ugliest websites on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 易趣网依旧一如既往的丑。

sentences.english: True to form, Finnie is much more interested in talking about her students.
sentences.chinese: 范尼还是一如既往地更乐意谈论她的学生们。

sentences.english: As always, thanks for checking out our photo collections!
sentences.chinese: 一如既往，谢谢你观赏我们的图片集。

sentences.english: The aim of the Co. is to protect the brand of "Yulong" for ever.
sentences.chinese: 一如既往地维护“玉龙”品牌是公司的目标。

sentences.english: The Southern Aral, however, still remains a shadow of its former self.
sentences.chinese: 然而，咸海的南部依然一如既往。

sentences.english: However, he has consistently declined all offers.
sentences.chinese: 然而，叶峰一如既往地婉拒了这些提议。

sentences.english: All the same, I should very much have liked to be Pliny the Younger.
sentences.chinese: 但一如既往的，我非常希望成为小普里尼。

sentences.english: We will, as always, firmly support your just struggle.
sentences.chinese: 我们将一如既往坚决支持你们的正义斗争。

sentences.english: The Chinese embassy will continue to provide the best possible support.
sentences.chinese: 中国使馆将一如既往的提供力所能及的支持。

sentences.english: As always, Buffett cares solely about value, not what the market thinks.
sentences.chinese: 一如既往的是，巴菲特只关心价值，而非市场的看法。

sentences.english: We will continue to forge ahead and to the general user services.
sentences.chinese: 我们将一如既往，开拓进取，向广大用户服务。

sentences.english: Zests for life are as great as ever.
sentences.chinese: 对生活的极大乐趣一如既往。

sentences.english: I enjoyed as always reading my favorite book and switched to surf the internet afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 我一如既往地翻阅我心爱的书册，后来又上网。
他一如既往地支持着他们。

definition: as before/still
consistent/constant/from start to finish/all along/persistent
unswerving from start to finish (idiom)
still/as before
as usual
always (previously)/a period of time in the recent past
still (remaining)/to remain (the same)/yet
complete change from the normal state (idiom); quite uncharacteristic/entirely outside the norm/out of character
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
in the past always/for a long time now/until now
to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist/unremitting efforts
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
from beginning to end/all along
conscientious/earnest/serious/to take seriously/to take to heart
the slightest amount or degree/a bit
or/still/nevertheless/had better
